A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall it’s a good movie. It’s middle if the pack for me in terms of Star Wars films. So much anticipation built up into these characters just to have it fall flat. I really wanted to love this movie but I just like it. I enjoyed it but left the theater asking myself “why did they do that” “what was the point of that” and “what were they thinking”. After a second viewing and a rewatch of The Force Awakens\, I liked it better. Changed my rating.
